product_info.name: Necklace
product_info.description: A breathtaking 24-carat gold dust necklace, crafted with meticulous artistry. Each delicate grain of pure gold dust is set within a fine chain, creating a shimmering cascade of light that dances with every movement. Luxurious yet understated, this necklace embodies timeless sophistication and is perfect for both grand occasions and everyday elegance.
